summary: Audit guardrail bootstrap failed because HAL_SECRET_KAVEDARR_API_KEY is not configured; HAL telemetry skipped.
required_actions: Provision HAL_SECRET_KAVEDARR_API_KEY and rerun spec-ops-audit with SPEC_OPS_TELEMETRY_HAL=1.
If HAL credentials remain unavailable, obtain governance approval for SPEC_OPS_HAL_SKIP=1 and record the justification before reattempting audit.

agreements: All agents identify missing HAL secret as the reason spec-audit cannot proceed.
